text: Mukesh Dhirubhai Ambani (born 19 April 1957) is an Indian billionaire businessman. He is the chairman, managing director, and largest shareholder of Reliance Industries Ltd. (RIL), a Fortune Global 500 company and India's most valuable company by market value.8250964307 He is currently the second richest man in Asia. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Indian businesspeople
title: Mukesh Ambani
